attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Our Dedicated, fair to all, Minister for Women & Equality has been very successful.
With her drive & determenation to action Equality for all women, she has been remarkable in achieving these aims.
Some of the Public love her, others dislike her so much so organising a petition to stand down.
This courageous Lady has all the signs of Leadership like Our former beloved " Iron Lady "" Magaret Thatcher.
These qualities are the making of a great Minister, leading from the front, selfless, willing to take take the knocks to achieve her aims.
Minister, thank you sincerly.
